title: “The Era of And”, 50 Companies to Watch in 2020, The Future of Live Media
itunes:title: “The Era of And”, 50 Companies to Watch in 2020, The Future of Live Media
description:
Jim Coulter, Co-CEO at TPG, discusses corporate governance and "The Era of And". David Dwyer, Bloomberg Intelligence Global Director of Research, talks about 50 Companies to Watch in 2020. Jonathan Nelson, CEO at Providence Equity, breaks down what's ahead in live media programming. Macy's CEO Jeff Gennette and Simon Property Group CEO David Simon talks about why the mall is not dead, the health of the consumer and growth of ecommerce. And Joseph Lusardi, CEO of Curaleaf, looks ahead to the future of the cannabis industry.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
